comments:
Driver:  WTP 1.0.1 20060214_1429

When creating a dynamic Web project targetted to Tomcat 5.0, the wizard allows the checkbox "add to EAR" to be checked but finishs with the error:

Failed while installing Dynamic Web Module 2.4.  
Details:  java.lang.NullPointerException

The details button does not show the stack trace (which I think it should).

If I look at the console, the stack trace is:

I also got the NPE once when trying to create Web project targetting IBM WebSphere v6.0 and I check "add to EAR".  However, when I tried again, it did not happen.
Not a problem with WTP 1.0.1 anymore.
